Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a device resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

AWSLocation.description: The Amazon Web Services location of the device, if applicable.

properties.name: Zone
properties.description: The Zone that the device is located in. Specify the ID of an Availability Zone, Local Zone, Wavelength Zone, or an Outpost.

type.description: The Zone that the device is located in. Specify the ID of an Availability Zone, Local Zone, Wavelength Zone, or an Outpost.

properties.name: SubnetArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet that the device is located in.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the subnet that the device is located in.

resource.description: The AWS::NetworkManager::Device type describes a device.

properties.name: GlobalNetworkId
properties.description: The ID of the global network.

type.description: The ID of the global network.

properties.name: AWSLocation
properties.description: The Amazon Web Services location of the device, if applicable.

type.description: The Amazon Web Services location of the device, if applicable.

attributes.description: The AWS::NetworkManager::Device type describes a device.

properties.name: DeviceArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device.

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: The date and time that the device was created.

type.description: The date and time that the device was created.
